title: Eric Trump touts bitcoin as new gold — and claims dad will lead the crypto revolution
description: Lydia Moynihan sits down with Eric Trump and American Bitcoin CEO Asher Genoot for a high-stakes conversation on the U.S.’s rapid acceleration in the crypto arms race. From leveraging low-cost Texas energy to fast-tracking a Nasdaq listing, the two paint a picture of a nation charging ahead. Trump slams the Biden administration’s financial policies, hailing...
